Pure PHP , laravel framwork). 
- 
This core building follow microservices parttern (JWT, SSO, 
GATEWAY, ….)

Using Message Broker (RabbitMq) handling message between 
services.

Using Redis for logging cache, JWT token.

Android App

to server.

Duties and Responsibilities:

management 
    + Extract data from Apple Health app and sync data to server.

and control application in Medical) 
Duties and Responsibilities: 
+ Contribute in all phases of software development lifecycle. 
+ Ensure design are in compliance with specifications. 
+ Ensure the best possible performance quantity and 
responsiveness of the applications. 
+ Support continuous improvement by investigation alternative 
and technologies and presenting these for architectural review. 
+ Project configurations

 + Build test case

Bootstrap, CanJs, AngulaJs

-  Report tools: Jasper Reports 
-  Experience in configure web server: Tomcat, Jboss 
- Experience in working web service (Restful service, SOAP 
service) 
-  Source control: SVN, Git 
- 
MeteorJS (JavaScript web framework) 
- 
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills. 
3. Open source Project: 
+ OHIF Viewer (Open Health Imaging) : customise and build software 
for medical imaging applications. 
- 
https://github.com/OHIF/Viewers/wiki
